snippet: Ubaldo Jimenez struck out 10 in seven innings to lead the Cleveland Indians to a 4-3 win over the host Kansas City Royals in a matchup of two teams in the thick of the American League wild-card chase.
abstract: Cleveland Indians defeat Kansas City Royals, 4-3, gaining momentum in American League wild-card race.
lead_paragraph: Ubaldo Jimenez struck out 10 in seven innings to lead the Cleveland Indians to a 4-3 win over the host Kansas City Royals in a matchup of two teams in the thick of the American League wild-card chase.
